mapper.update: update offer set offerAction=#{offerAction} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from offer where companyId=#{companyId} and offerStatus=2

select o.*,u.userName from offer as o,user as u where o.companyId=#{companyId} and o.userId=u.id and o.offerStatus=2
order by offerSendTime DESC
limit #{start},5
select o.*,u.userName from offer as o,user as u where o.Id=#{Id} and o.userId=u.id
select count(*) from offer where userId=#{userId} and offerStatus=2

select o.*,c.companySimpleName from offer as o,company as c where o.userId=#{userId} and o.companyId=c.id and o.offerStatus=2
order by offerSendTime DESC
limit #{start},10
select o.*,c.companyName from offer as o,company as c where o.Id=#{Id} and o.companyId=c.id
